      • get

        public Iterable<Hyphenator> get(Query query,
                                String style,
                                URI baseURI)
        Select Hyphenators based on a query and a CSS style sheet possibly containing @hyphenation-resource rules. Contrary to TransformProvider.util.Memoize.get(Query), this method is not memoized, and the returned objects may not be selectable based on their identifier.
        Parameters:
        baseURI - Base URI for resolving relative paths in CSS against.
